Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController.GameUpdateListener, ServerClientCommunicator.CommunicatorListener, Runnable
public class VirtualView extends Object implements ServerClientCommunicator.CommunicatorListener, GameController.GameUpdateListener, Runnable
This class models a virtual view, this class communicates with the client (through a ServerClientCommunicator) and forward every Request to controller and the game controller. The Response(s) are transmitted back to the client.
